entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mvc #53969
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider constructor with ILogger #53963
  • Nested Editor<T> crashing because of bug in HtmlFieldPrefix.Combine method #53956
    8.0.x
  • QuickGrid: Add Column Virtualization #53953
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53952

Closed

  • Update WiX dependencies #53974
    9.0-preview2
  • Conditionally provided parameters in Blazor's razor syntax #47142
  • Usability: PathString.StartsWithSegments() with a trailing slash is not intuitive behavior #2713
    Backlog
  • Invalid Anti-Forgery Token on OIDC Response #53868
  • DotNet.createJSObjectReference TS Type (transfer from DotNet.createJSObjectReference, Issue #530)) #53944
  • Postback on blazor InteractiveServer doesn't work #53950
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #53926
  • Perf regression: fortunes #53948

PullRequests

Created

  • Update build to use a local package cache from a submodule and build offline #53975
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24112.1 #53955
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update Wix version #53973
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 2.1.7 #53771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/7.0] Update Wix version #53972
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/8.0] Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53408
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53846
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/8.0] SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53862
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0.3
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4872968` #53845
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix hot reload memory leak #53928
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Update Wix version #53971
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53892
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • Update Wix version #53970
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • PathString.StartsWithSegments: Clarify trailing slash behavior in doc comments #53924
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Update Identity dependencies #53883
    area-infrastructure
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
